trans-unit.source: An abstract class that describes a gradient, composed of gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: 抽象類別，描述組成漸層停駐。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from GradientBrush describe different ways of interpreting gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: 類別繼承自 GradientBrush 描述解譯漸層停駐的不同方式。

trans-unit.source: A GradientBrush is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: GradientBrush 是一種<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，並因此可凍結來改善效能。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref>類別具有指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref> used to specify the location and color of the transition points in a gradient.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref>用於漸層中指定的位置和轉換點的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies how the gradient's colors are interpolated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"></xref>列舉，指定如何插補的漸層色彩。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the colors in a gradient are interpolated.
trans-unit.target: 指定的色彩漸層插補的方式。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.ColorInterpolationMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.ColorInterpolationMode*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.ColorInterpolationMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush's gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定筆刷的漸層停駐。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref> objects associated with the brush, each of which specifies a color and an offset along the brush's gradient axis.
trans-unit.target: 集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref>物件相關聯的筆刷，其中每個都會指定色彩和筆刷的漸層軸上的位移。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the gradient brush's positioning coordinates are absolute or relative to the output area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref>列舉，其中指定漸層筆刷定位座標是絕對或相對至輸出區域。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> indicates the gradient brush's coordinates are expressed using device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: 值為<xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>指出漸層筆刷座標以使用與裝置無關的像素表示。</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref> value that specifies how the gradient brush's positioning coordinates are interpreted.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"> </xref>解譯值，指定如何漸層筆刷定位座標。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of spread method that specifies how to draw a gradient that starts or ends inside the bounds of the object to be painted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定如何繪製繪製物件的界限內開始或結束的漸層的展開方法的型別。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the available spread methods and their effect on <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示可用的模式方法和其影響<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: The red line indicates the gradient space.
trans-unit.target: 紅線表示漸層的空間。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>定義其漸層的空間和其<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>定義其漸層的空間和其<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: ![Different GradientSpread settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "Different GradientSpread settings") Gradient spread methods ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![不同的 GradientSpread 設定](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "不同的 GradientSpread 設定")漸層擴展方法 # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The type of spread method used to paint the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 展開方法用來繪製所使用漸層類型。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientSpreadMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientSpreadMethod"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
